newsitem.title: UK: Monument confirms purchase of London Bond Broking.
newsitem.headline: Monument confirms purchase of London Bond Broking.

text.p: Monument Derivatives Ltd said on Monday it had acquired the research and bond broking business of the London Bond Broking Company (LBB) from Albert E Sharp.
Albert E Sharp had previously held 55 percent of the brokerage. No financial details of the deal were given.

"The strengths of Monument and LBB are complementary and the combined group will be in a position to expand the research and brokerage services that it is able to provide," Monument said in a statement.
Monument, founded in 1991, is an independent broker specialising in derivatives markets.
